metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16831 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Smarty before 3.1.33-dev-4 allows attackers to bypass the trusted_dir protection mechanism via a file:./../ substring in an include statement.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16831` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

smarty3 - 3.1.31+20161214.1.c7d42e4+selfpack1-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: smarty3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.31+20161214.1.c7d42e4+selfpack1-3ubuntu0.1').
